DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study preliminary assessment Octohydroaminoacridine Succinate tablet treatment mild moderate Alzheimer 's disease explore efficacy safety best dose . The 288 patient randomly assign four group : high dose ( 4mg / time ) , moderate dose ( 2mg / time ) , low dose ( 1mg / time ) placebo group , include four week trial screen period follow 16 week double-blind treatment .
